title: Employee Portal Inner Page
reference-overview: The Employee Portal Inner Page is the foundation of the site, able to contain all manner of information in a variety of presentation styles. It follows all previously established tenets of Mobile Responsiveness.
reference-usage:
The Employee Portal Inner Page template is the primary method of presenting detailed information to the employee. It should be used for all internal pages (i.e., all pages other than the Log In page, the Employee Portal Home page and any modal windows).

The Inner Page supports all varieties of content presentation - graphical, tabular, text based, etc. It is intended as a flexible container.
reference-details:
The Employee Portal Inner Page template consists of the following three elements:

Product Header

This would be the same configuration of the Product Header that used on the Home Page.

Content Area

The content area is denoted by the white background that stretches from the Product Header to the Product Footer. This white content area connects to the Product Header at the top and the Product Footer at the bottom, creating one cohesive site.

Within this content area, you are free to use any combination of any of the components that are already built into the Evolution library.

Product Footer

This would be the same Product Footer used on the Home Page, and it should be based on either the Fat Footer or the Thin Footer
